metering: Yes, TTL Metering in Multi, Center-weighted, Spot Modes with Auto exposure Lock
operatingsystem: WINDOWS: Windows 832bit/64bit / Windows 732bit/64bit/ Windows Vista32bit/64bit/ Windows XPSP3 or later, Home/Pro 32bit
flashmodes: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Manual Flash, AUTO Red-Eye Flash, Flash On Red-Eye, Slow Synchro Red-Eye
autofocus: Yes, TTL contrast detection auto focus system
whitebalancing: Manual White Balancing, WB Fine Adjustment, WB Bracketing, Auto, Multi-P AUTO, Outdoors, Shade, Cloudy, Incandescent 1, Incandescent 2, Daylight,Neutral White, Cool White, Warm White, Manual, Details, White Balance Bracket Function
externalflash: Yes, Hot shoe TTL-A (TTL w/ pre-flash)
